projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: Is not a bug in our product

status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

not new to 1.6.1

  1. create or have a simple ipad project
  2. emulator Tab
  3. select 4.3 and launch
    4.now select 4.0 and launch

results: ipad still says 4.3, though a lok at the ios emulator menu items shows the ipad has the expected configuration. UNable to repro using xcode 4

{html}
fields.summary: iOS, xCode 4 - iPad emulator title bar not reflecting emulator (though em menu shows correct settings)

comments.body:
While I do see this issue as being real, it was with an old version of Xcode that Titanium no longer supports and it sounds like a bug with the iOS Simulator and not Titanium.

I tested the iOS Simulator that ships with Xcode 7.3 and the title displays the correct device after switching runtimes.
Closing ticket as the issue is not our bug.
